code: import React,{Fragment,useRef}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{LoginRequest}from'../../API/APIRequest';import{IsEmail,IsEmpty}from'../helper/Delete/FormHelper/FormHelper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Login=function Login(){var emailRef,passRef=useRef();var onSubmit=function onSubmit(){var email=emailRef.value;var password=passRef.value;console.log(email);if(IsEmail(email)){toast.error('email required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else if(IsEmpty(password)){toast.error('Password required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else{LoginRequest(email,password).then(function(result){if(result===true){window.location.href="/";}else{toast.error('Email or Password Not Match',{position:"bottom-center"});}});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__form__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:function ref(input){return emailRef=input;},type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:function ref(input){return passRef=input;},type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onClick:onSubmit,className:"login__btn",type:"button",value:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Sign Up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/sendOTP",children:"Forget Password"})})]})})})});};export default Login;
